description: This file provides utility functions to instantiate a Supabase client and check if the Supabase mode is enabled based on environment variables. It sets up a client configured for a browser environment with session persistence and refresh policies, and includes a helper to determine if the app is running with Supabase features enabled.

methods.name: getSupabase()
methods.description: Returns a memoized Supabase client configured with environment variables, with session persistence enabled;

methods.name: isSupabaseMode()
methods.description: Checks environment flags to determine if Supabase mode is enabled, supporting both JSON object format and comma-separated list.
